ingredients.ingredient: 6 ounces smoked salmon cream cheese spread

cookingTips: Cool hard-boiled eggs immediately in ice water for easier peeling and firmer whites
Use a piping bag for elegant presentation of the smoked salmon filling
Prepare filling up to 2 hours ahead and fill eggs just before serving to maintain texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through proper hard-boiling, peeling technique, and elegant plating to create impressive appetizers.
